
{{alias}}( arrays, shape, fcn )
    Applies a binary callback to elements in two n-dimensional nested input
    arrays and assigns results to elements in an n-dimensional nested output
    array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    arrays: ArrayLikeObject
        Array-like object containing two input nested arrays and one output
        nested array.

    shape: Array<integer>
        Array shape.

    fcn: Function
        Unary callback.

    Examples
    --------
    > var x = [ [ 1.0, 2.0 ], [ 3.0, 4.0 ] ];
    > var y = [ [ 1.0, 2.0 ], [ 3.0, 4.0 ] ];
    > var z = [ [ 0.0, 0.0 ], [ 0.0, 0.0 ] ];
    > var shape = [ 2, 2 ];
    > {{alias}}( [ x, y, z ], shape, {{alias:@stdlib/math/base/ops/add}} );
    > z
    [ [ 2.0, 4.0 ], [ 6.0, 8.0 ] ]

    See Also
    --------
